text: Ladislav Pazdera (born 6 December 1936) is a Czech gymnast. He competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics and the 1964 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:People from Brno-Country District Category:Czech male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Czechoslovakia Category:Gymnasts at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Gymnasts at the 1964 Summer Olympics
title: Ladislav Pazdera
